text: William Bruce Gordon Johnstone (30 January 1937 â€“ 3 March 2022) was a South African racing driver. He participated in one Formula One World Championship Grand Prix, on 29 December 1962. He scored no championship points. Johnstone was born in Durban, South Africa. Johnstone died on 3 March 2022, at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2022 deaths Category:South African racecar drivers Category:Formula One drivers Category:Sportspeople from Durban
title: Bruce Johnstone (racing driver)
